lexUnit.name: rump.n
lexUnit.definition: FN: .the hind part of the body of a mammal, the lower back of a bird, or humourously a person's buttocks

sentence.text: As a final gesture of international goodwill , I was given a massive injection into my rump , before being released on Friday morning .
When the little animal is disturbed it burrows furiously down into the ground until it has completely disappeared except for its horny rump .
The noise her substantial rump and the side of the bus produced as they came into contact , increased her alarm .
She yanked the reins and brought the whip down hard upon its bony rump .
A muscular Company goon in macho combat gear slapped her rump .
" Aye , come on with ye ! " shouted the dealer , poking his stick against the cow 's rump .
I poked a finger into the animal 's rump and he trotted forward , proceeded unhesitatingly between the posts and into the passage .
She reached out and stroked the cat 's rump , her plump , tapering fingers sinking into the fur .
Rounding the bend from the top path down towards the stable she was brandishing a stick , beating the cows ' dripping rumps and cursing them aloud for refusing to hurry .
ABBERLEY : You still have a very nice rump .
It took the mantri a long time to work right round the bull , from shoulder to rump down one side and then from rump to shoulder back up the other .
The grapeshot strikes her in the rump .
He watched her climb on to the chair , and she saw him grin at the sight of her sore rump , which she thought must burn as brightly as any beacon .
He slapped the water buffalo on its massive rump and we headed down towards the beach .
Mountain goats , on the other hand , aim for the opponent 's rump and , just as the musk ox 's skull is enormously reinforced , so too is the skin on the mountain goat 's rump .
It bestrode her severely-parted hair like a sequined circus girl , riding backwards on the solid rump of a matronly old mare .
John got him to sit facing backward in the saddle , resting the foot on the horse 's rump .
Her ample rump stuck out towards him .
